prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with red and blue scales that can soar through the skies.
Design a fierce-looking creature with large wings and a muscular build, ideal for battles.
Show me a Pokemon resembling a dragon with vibrant hues and a powerful presence.
Generate a majestic flying-type Pokemon that embodies strength and speed in its design.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a sleek body shape and striking colors, perfect for a legendary status.
Make a Pokemon that combines elements of fire and air with a dynamic, aggressive appearance.
Give me a creature that showcases the beauty of dragons with sharp features and a bold color palette.
